external_games.name: Enchanted Katya and the Mystery of the Lost Wizard
Enchanted Katya and the Mystery of the Lost Wizard

name: Enchanted Katya and the Mystery of the Lost Wizard
summary: Time management game. Help Katya, a student of the highest magic mastery school, manage a magic shop and locate its missing owner - the wizard Took. Choose ingredients, brew potions, and locate mysterious artifacts that reveal the wizard's location.
